snippet: Restore Our Future said the ads would run Tuesday through Jan. 21, the day of the South Carolina primary.
abstract: Restore Our Future said the ads would run Tuesday through Jan. 21, the day of the South Carolina primary.
lead_paragraph: The "super PAC" supporting Mitt Romney is placing a huge chunk of money on advertising in South Carolina - $2.3 million worth - as it prepares to wage what is expected to be a far more intense race after the New Hampshire primary on Tuesday.

headline.main: Pro-Romney 'Super PAC' to Spend $2.3 Million in South Carolina
